page.title: 04CROP ROTATION IN MID ESSEX
page.content: A{4 YEAR}rotation of crops is worked at Fithlers,Blows and Butt Hatch Farm. {YEAR 1-BREAK CROP:}This could be pot- atoes,tick beans or more prob- ably{OIL SEED RAPE.} {YEAR 2-WINTER WHEAT:}This farmer will try to buy the very best pos- sible quality milling wheat for bread. {YEAR 3-FEEDING WHEAT:}This will be used for making biscuits or animal feed. {YEAR 4-BARLEY:}This will be used for malting or animal feed. It is first out "on ear" and first to be cut. The rotation is done and the field is then ready for an August sowing of{OIL {SEED RAPE. } Some farms grow continous crops with- out any rotation but this can cause problems with more diseases.
